name: 流血
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
 user._bleed = user._bleed || 0;
 user.setStateCounter(71, user._bleed);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
user._bleed = undefined;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Custom Turn Start Effect>
user._bleed = user._bleed || 0;
user._block = user._block || 0;
for(var m = 1, m <= 3, m++){
if(user._bleed > 0){
  user._defence = user._defence || 0;
  if(user._defence > 0){
    user.gainHp(0);
    user.startDamagePopup();
    user._bleed -= 1;
    user.setStateCounter(71, user._bleed);
    if(target._bleed = 0){
     target.removeState(71);
     }
    user._defence -= 1;
    user.setStateCounter(213, user._defence);
    if(target._defence = 0){
     target.removeState(213);
     }
    }
  else{
     var bleed = -user.hp*0.02 - user._block*10;
     bleed = Math.max(10 - target.hp, bleed);
     user.gainHp(bleed);
     user.startDamagePopup();
     user._bleed -= 1;
     user.setStateCounter(71, user._bleed);
    }
  }
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

<Custom Respond Effect>
target._block = target._block || 0;
if(this.isDamage() && this.isHpEffect() && value > 0 && this.isPhysical()){
 target._defence = target._defence || 0; 
if(target._defence > 0){
 target.gainHp(0); 
 target.startDamagePopup();
 target._defence -= 1;
 target.setStateCounter(213, target._defence);
  if (target._defence <= 0){ 
  target.removeState(213); 
  }
  target._bleed -= 1;
 user.setStateCounter(71, user._bleed);
 if(target._bleed = 0){
  target.removeState(71);
 }
}
else{
var i = user.atk - target.def
 i *= (user.level*user.atk/2048+2)/2;
 i += target.hp*0.02;
 i = Math.floor(i)*(-1);
 i -= target._block*10;
 i = Math.max(10 - target.hp, i);
 target.gainHp(i);
 target.startDamagePopup();
 target._bleed -= 1;
 user.setStateCounter(71, user._bleed);
 if(target._bleed = 0){
  target.removeState(71);
 }
}
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

name: 通用吸血计算
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
  user._absrate = user._absrate || 0;
  user._pbsrate = user._pbsrate || 0;
  user._mbsrate = user._mbsrate || 0;
  this._bsaffective = this._bsaffective || 1;
  if (this.isSkill && value >0 && this._bsaffective > 0){
   var bsrate = 0;
   bsrate += user._absrate;
   if (this.isPhysical()){
     bsrate += user._pbsrate;
     }
   else{
     if (this.isMagical()){
       bsrate += user._mbsrate;
       }
     }
   bsrate *= this._bsaffective;
   bsrate = Math.min(bsrate, 1);
   var hpgain = Math.floor(value*bsrate);
   var a = Math.floor(user.mhp - user.hp);
   if(hpgain > a){
    user.gainHp(a);
    var overheal = Math.floor(hpgain - a);
    if (user.isStateAffected(218)){
     overheal *= 0.2;
    }
    else{
    if (user.isStateAffected(219)){
     overheal *= 0.3;
     }
    else{
   if (user.isStateAffected(220)){
    overheal *= 0.4;
   }
   }
   }
   user.gainBarrier(overheal); 
   }
   else{
    user.gainHp(hpgain);
   }
  }
</Custom Establish Effect>

this._pcirate = this._pcirate || 1;
target._block = target._block || 0;

var i = Math.floor(target.mhp*0.06 - (user.atk-target.def)*(1 + target.level * (user.atk-target.def)/2048));
var j = Math.floor(target.mhp*0.04);
var k = Math.floor(Math.min(Math.max(i, j), 20000) * this._pcirate *(-1));
k -= target._block*10;
k = Math.max(10 - target.hp, k);
target._defence = target._defence || 0; 
if(target._defence > 0){
 target.gainHp(0); 
 target.startDamagePopup();
 target._defence -= 1;
 target.setStateCounter(213, target._defence);
  if (target._defence <= 0){ 
  target.removeState(213); 
  }
}
else{
target.gainHp(k); 
target.startDamagePopup();
}
}
</Custom Establish Effect>
